name: momentum-rider-fullstack
description: Full-stack development setup for Momentum Rider

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd server && npm run format && cd ../frontend && npm run format

author: Momentum Rider Team
